name: Young Professional Bundle
shortDescription: If you’re under 30 with a four-year degree, we know you are going places. Get fast-tracked into a private banking experience at a 50% reduced monthly fee. This bundle includes a credit card facility with an optional overdraft, plus all the perks you deserve.
description: If you’re under 30 with a four-year degree, we know you are going places. Get fast-tracked into a private banking experience at a 50% reduced monthly fee.~This bundle includes a credit card facility with an optional overdraft, plus all the perks you deserve.
additionalInfo: Professional account with significant transnational value
Dedicated relationship banker for you and your household, supported by a dedicated credit team and with access to investment, global-banking and wealth specialists
Nedbank Money app or Online Banking for world-class secure digital banking
Professional cheque and credit cards offering local and international perks
SMS notifications: eNotes and No-funds alert
salesHighlights: Enjoy unlimited airport lounge access, travel insurance, free delivery of your forex and 50% discount on the prestigious American Express® Platinum Charge Card (for the global traveller).
Children get 4 lounge visits per year if they are on an active Dezign4me or Unlocked.me Student account.
Get exclusive benefits when using your Visa Signature credit card.
10 international airport lounge visits (including 1 guest allowance per visit) via LoungeKey.
Significantly increased travel insurance when buying airline tickets using these cards.
Purchase protection and warranties on purchases made using these cards.
24/7 emergency assistance should you need card replacement, cash or payments authorised.
24/7 concierge services for hotels, restaurants or event bookings and so much more.
Greenbacks rewards are earned on your everyday card swipes and online purchases.
Exclusive deals at unlocked.me. This includes deals on the latest tech, fashion, travel and once in a lifetime experience.

Tailored financing: With the support of your dedicated relationship banker, credit decisions are personalised to your unique circumstances and you can get: 100% loans for home loan applications up to R5 million. Apply online and qualify for 1% cash back (up to R15 000). 100% loans for vehicle finance applications. Your banker is equipped to provide you with a quick vehicle finance approval. All credit applications are subject to final credit approval.

Financial advice: Your financial growth also comes with important decisions and responsibilities. We'll give you access to a financial planner to assess your financial position and your future goals, consider different retirement scenarios, calculate the various costs and help you determine the optimal portfolio for your circumstances.
valueAddedServices: Professional account with significant transactional value
Dedicated relationship banker for you and your household, supported by a dedicated credit team and with access to investment, global-banking and wealth specialists
Nedbank Money app or Online Banking for world-class secure access to your account wherever you are
Professional cheque cards offering local and international perks
Professional credit cards offering local and international travel perks

eligibilityRules.description: Minimum 4 year degree or 3 years plus Honours (NQF level 8 equivalent)
There is no minimum income requirement
Not available to trust, companies or legal entities
All credit facilities are subject to credit and affordability checks

requiredDocuments.description: card/document or passport with valid permit

requiredDocuments.attributeName: 3-Months bank statements or letter of appointment/contract
requiredDocuments.description: 3-Months bank statements or letter of appointment/contract

requiredDocuments.attributeName: You will be required to sign a declaration that you have the required level of education to qualify
requiredDocuments.description: You will be required to sign a declaration that you have the required level of education to qualify

requiredDocuments.attributeName: For overdraft and credit card applications, additional documents may be required
requiredDocuments.description: For overdraft and credit card applications, additional documents may be required

productFeatures.name: Income
productFeatures.description: There is no minimum income requirement

productFeatures.name: Cashwithdrawalsatparticipatingretailers
productFeatures.description: Cash withdrawals at participating retailers and at a Nedbank ATM included

productFeatures.name: AirtimewithoutAirtime
productFeatures.description: Airtime without Airtime (purchase airtime without having airtime using *130*001#)

productFeatures.name: SendiMali
productFeatures.description: Send i-Mali (Send money to a cellphone number using *120*001#)

productFeatures.name: Chargecard
productFeatures.description: American Express® Platinum Charge Card available at 50% discounted annual fee (for the first year only)

productFeatures.name: Internationalairportloungeaccess
productFeatures.description: Ten visits per annum. One guest per visit

productFeatures.name: Domesticairportloungeaccess
productFeatures.description: Unlimited access to Bidvest domestic and international lounges

productFeatures.name: Forexdelivery
productFeatures.description: Free forex delivery (foreign cash & travel card) at preferential rates

productFeatures.name: Insurance
productFeatures.description: Travel insurance, purchase protection and warrantees included when paying with your Visa Signature Professional Banking Credit Card.

productFeatures.name: Tailoredfinancing
productFeatures.description: Tailored financing: With the support of your dedicated relationship banker, credit decisions are personalised to your unique circumstances and you can get: 100% loans for home loan applications of less than R1,5 million and 100% loans for vehicle finance applications of less than R400 000.  All credit applications are subject to final credit approval and terms and conditions.
